geometry.proportions: 1:1 square canvas, generous breathing room around object
geometry.element_arrangement: single centered main object, optional tiny secondary detail for context (leaf, grain, stitch)

composition.spatial_depth: subtle depth with gentle elevation, no dramatic perspective
composition.scale_consistency: strictly consistent size and visual weight across entire set

lighting.shadow: very soft grounding shadow, close to object
lighting.highlighting: subtle highlights, no sharp specular shine

textures.surface_treatment: stylized, cozy realism (faint grain lines, soft fabric, gentle food texture)

render_quality.visual_clarity: clear silhouette, instantly readable at small sizes

color_palette.range: earthy pastels and muted naturals (no neon, no harsh contrast)
color_palette.usage: limited palette per icon, harmonious across entire set

icon_behavior.branding_alignment: fits cozy farming / idle game aesthetic
icon_behavior.interchangeability: perfectly cohesive with crops, animals, crafts, and recipes
